column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A foreign tourist died of a heart attack and in a hotel room on May 18
column5: at 6:30 pm at the Khavi Villa
column13: Phnom Penh.------Victim was named JANN NICHOLAS HAZLETT
column14: a 46-year-old male tourist.------Authorities stated that the victim died of a heart attack.------The body was transported to the Khmer-Soviet Friendship Hospital (Phnom Penh)
